website_summaries.verdict: Incredibly warm, lightweight down jacket for both around-town wearability and cold-weather activities.
pros: Amazing packability into a quart-sized Ziplock bag for camping trips
Kept reviewers warm in subfreezing weather
Relaxed cut allows for layering underneath
Warm, insulated hood a popular feature
Long arms ideal for taller men
Reflective interior lining keeps body heat in

customer_reviews.title: Columbia Mens Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he really likes it. It is not too heavy, but keeps him warm enough during this cold Minnesota winter. He wanted one with a hood, and this one has it. He is tall and often struggles with the arm length of coats. This coat has long enough arms that he doesn't feel half his arm is exposed if he lifts it up. We would recommend this jacket to other men.
customer_reviews.author: MamaC

customer_reviews.title: Superb warmth, weight and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Super light. Super warm! Fits fantastic! I’m 6 ft tall and weigh 426lbs and the 6X fit me great! The sleeves are the perfect length. You can comfortably wear while driving too.
customer_reviews.author: Sooch

customer_reviews.title: good down to the 20s... without wind chill.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is good down to the 20s as long as there isn't any wind. If you layer a rain jacket over it, that will help. I like layering this under my bigger jacket for really cold days. Very light, and I love the hood. The only thing I'm not loving about this jacket is that it sheds quite a bit of down. It's just how down jackets behave but it's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sze

customer_reviews.title: It fits!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m shortish, fat and a female-sound great so far right, lol. The jacket showed up today, AMAZING. Lightweight, warm and stylish, grey color is so cute. Will def order a 2nd in another color!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Losing Down Every Step of the Way.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and fit of this jacket. This was my second time trying out a Colombia down piece and the second time I've been truly disappointed. After the second time wearing there is a significant amount of down coming out through pretty much every seam imaginable. I've worn it a handful of times and can already notice a difference in how full it was compared to now. I'm not sure if I received a "dud" or if Columbia is known for this. I think from now on I'll pay the extra $$ and go for a brand I know won't lose down immediately out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and light
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son. He loves it. the jacket is very warm and light. Only downside is that it leaks down. Not a lot but just a little.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Srivastava

customer_reviews.title: Thin, warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this coat, but it was already shedding feathers the day I got it. That’s sort of annoying but not a deal breaker. It is very warm even though it is thin. My other Columbia coat has these things on the selves that would be absolutely perfect here and even more perfect if they had thumb holes too!
customer_reviews.author: SRBZA

customer_reviews.title: Warm coat, worth every penny paid!!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was bought as a present for our boss who is constantly breaking, tearing his coats due to his work. He does deliveries all day and has two down coats patched up with tapes so for Christmas we decided to give him something lighter and also that would keep him warm enough when doing deliveries. So far he’s has no complaints and said he loves it. 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼😁😁😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Esther S

customer_reviews.title: Feather comes out
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with the coat. The feather comes out not only from the outer, but also from the inner part of it. My whole sweater was in feathers as I took the coat off! Since then each day I find more and more of them on my clothes (the pictures show the first two days of this experience). It's a shame to sell a product like that. I have a doubt that this is a fake one, since it seems to me impossible that Columbia can produce a coat of such a poor quality. Also, the material (feather) that comes out is not mentioned in the product description at all!
customer_reviews.author: GGT c/o George Abuladze

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly warm considering how thin and lightweight it is. I wore it during a windy rainstorm and had no problems. I've noticed some loose feathers here and there so I'm not sure how it will hold up over time but overall, I'm very happy with my purchase. I wish it had more pockets.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMatter

customer_reviews.title: Makes wearing a coat enjoyable.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable coat and affordable price. Very light too, which is nice being most winter jackets are quite heavy. Throw this over a hoodie and I'm perfectly fine in subzero or single digits temps. Seems to run true to size. I'm 5'6" 180 lbs and got a medium. I have just enough for a hoodie and maybe another layer too if I wanted. I bought the grey one being it was almost 60 bucks cheaper for some reason. All in all great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Steen

customer_reviews.title: The down feathers are coming out of the jacket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jacket a little prior to winter season and started wearing it in the last two weeks. The down feathers are coming out of the jacket from the front and back. I'm a little worried that this will continue throughout the winter season and it will not have any insulation left by the end of the season. Not to mention that it looks bad to have pieces of feathers coming out of your jacket.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, but wasn't exactly what I was looking for

customer_reviews.author: Darien

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his new jacket and will actually wear ...

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable Jacket for cold weather

The other is that there are no sinch cords for the hood so there is no way to draw the hood in around your face. Otherwise, it is a very warm and practical jacket and much warmer than I thought for a 550
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight,  warm jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that it took a lot for me to spend this amount on a coat. I also have to admit that it was well worth it. This jacket is the warmest one that I have ever owned. At first glance, you wouldn't think it would be warm at all. Wrong! I live in a Northeast Ohio and out gets pretty cold here in the winter. I can tell you, this jacket had actually made me sweat on several occasions. It does exactly what they claim, reflects your own body heat to keep you warm. Great craftsmanship. Lightweight, stylish, all around awesome jacket. I highly recommend.

product_meta.title: Columbia Men’s Voodoo Falls 590 TurboDown Jacket, Thermal Reflective Warmth
product_meta.description:
For those who love spending time in winter conditions or live in cold climates, wearing a comfortable, water-resistant, and durable jacket can keep you warm, safe, and dry. The Columbia Men’s Voodoo Falls 590 TurboDown Hooded Jacket is infused with 550-fill powder lining and 0 g thermal insulation. These advanced-technology materials work together to provide the ultimate warmth and comfort. This Columbia Hooded Jacket retains nearly every degree of body heat. In fact, it’s one of the softest, warmest, and lightest jackets made by Columbia.

Our Columbia snow jacket includes a down-style baffling that is flexible, provides cushioning, and delivers a timeless versatile fit—without wearing thin over time. This extends product life and keeps you comfortable. The Columbia down jacket for men has been designed with a modern classic fit. For additional comfort that is adjustable and produces a snug fit, Columbia has added a drawcord hem and binding cuffs. The Columbia Men’s Voodoo Falls 590 TurboDown Hooded winter jacket’s water-resistant shell with grid baffling provides a snug, close-to-body feel that is anything but bulky. It has been certified to the Responsible Down Standard (RDS) by Control Union.

This men’s winter jacket is offered on Amazon.com in multiple sizes that range from small to XXL. You can choose from several colors including black, collegiate navy, deep water, graphite, mossy green, mountain red, phoenix blue, and super blue. To ensure the perfect fit, follow these steps for measuring, and refer to the size chart. To determine the neck size, measure at the base or thickest part of your neck. For sleeves, start at the center back of your neck, and measure across the shoulder and down to the wrist. Round up to the next even number. For the chest and bust, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits, and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.
